body.p:
To his excellency Thos. E Bramblette
Governor --

The undersigned, Member of the House of Representatives from Whitley county Ky -- would respectfully state, that he w is informed and believes it to be true, that Wm Lastly was taken up and tried in the Whitley circuit court before he had an opportunity of writing to his friends and family, and without a chance to prepare his defence He obtained his information from the people of this county about the time of his trial -- He has known the family of Wm Lastly for about 20 years and the general character of the family has been good --

Whitley Cir Ct
Application of Lastley Wm for pardon
Statement of A J Veach
6 years
Pardoned 9th Decr & issued E L V
Secty
